articles.title: About this site
articles.description: This website consists of a collection of works done for Visual Analytics course I took during my MITB(Analytics) journey. I hope you enjoy reading them!

articles.title: VisAnalytics Course
articles.description: Welcome to a very Visual sharing. I hope you enjoy it!
articles.contents:
Data Visualization is an integral part of Data Analysis and Data
Analysis for the very simple reason that we all like and understand
visuals more than paragraphs of text. Even more so if the visualization
provides us the ability to interact with the data in the form of filters
and selections.
The visualizations shared here are developed using
R. The code chunks are also included for
reproducibility. GGplot package in R allows us to build
visuals from the scratch, giving us the flexibility to design the
minutest detail in the graphic including axis, axis title, axis title
font, axis tick marks, grid lines, legends, title, the list is quite
long.
Feel free to explore, any feedback and suggestions are welcome at Linkedin
